Generous support is provided by the Knight Foundation. Knight Foundation supports transformational ideas that promote quality journalism, advance media innovation, engage communities and foster the arts. The foundation believes that democracy thrives when people and communities are informed and engaged. For more, visit KnightFoundation.org. The grant number for this grant is 2012-0284.

The MIT Center for Civic Media works hand in hand with diverse communities to collaboratively create, design, deploy, and assess civic media tools and practices.

Bocoup moves the Open Web forward by building and supporting tomorrow's Open Web technologies through consulting, training, and community development.
